data.what_is: Eggflow is a developers team which provide merchants with free apps on Shopify
data.product_description: Eggflow is a developers team which provide merchants with free apps on Shopify

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Eggflow?
In our Company we manage our ads ourselves, EggFlow helps us to make more traffic to our store and exchange ads with our partners. Also, due to our product nature, we have to set a specific audience with specific parameters, EggFlow helps us in this matter. besides the features of tracking and motoring and forecasting our store with great insights.

What do you dislike about Eggflow?
the integration with the others partner needs to be more extended and includes a wide range of store partners. Also, pricing needs to be lower.

What problems is Eggflow solving and how is that benefiting you?
with a minimum cost, we can reach the maximum number of a specific audience on our scheduled campaign, that's lead to make the company's profit increase. Also managing the Customers by automation scripts for engagements and alignments.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Eggflow?
review_question_answers.answer: In our Company we manage our ads ourselves, EggFlow helps us to make more traffic to our store and exchange ads with our partners. Also, due to our product nature, we have to set a specific audience with specific parameters, EggFlow helps us in this matter. besides the features of tracking and motoring and forecasting our store with great insights.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Eggflow?
review_question_answers.answer: the integration with the others partner needs to be more extended and includes a wide range of store partners. Also, pricing needs to be lower.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Eggflow solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: with a minimum cost, we can reach the maximum number of a specific audience on our scheduled campaign, that's lead to make the company's profit increase. Also managing the Customers by automation scripts for engagements and alignments.

initial_reviews.review_title: Amazing tool to manage the audience of my ads
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Eggflow?
EggFlow allows me to increase the traffic of my store by exchanging product ads with partners store, that's include the feature of allow my ads appear to a specific targeted audience. also allow me to track and monitoring my store performance with comprehensive reports thats included.

What do you dislike about Eggflow?
its still too early for me to say what I'm dislike or a weakness, but in nushel Eggflow needs to make more wide integrated with other partners. today I'm using facebook but also in future some partners has to be included. I'm trust that Eggflow will expand their range.

What problems is Eggflow solving and how is that benefiting you?
Mainly Eggflow helps me to reach more people on Facebook Ad Campaigns with minimum cost by helping me to target the right people. EggFlow helps me to increase my ecommerce revenue with easy some automation and customer engagement.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Eggflow?
review_question_answers.answer: EggFlow allows me to increase the traffic of my store by exchanging product ads with partners store, that's include the feature of allow my ads appear to a specific targeted audience. also allow me to track and monitoring my store performance with comprehensive reports thats included.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Eggflow?
review_question_answers.answer: its still too early for me to say what I'm dislike or a weakness, but in nushel Eggflow needs to make more wide integrated with other partners. today I'm using facebook but also in future some partners has to be included. I'm trust that Eggflow will expand their range.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Eggflow solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Mainly Eggflow helps me to reach more people on Facebook Ad Campaigns with minimum cost by helping me to target the right people. EggFlow helps me to increase my ecommerce revenue with easy some automation and customer engagement.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great tool to help you boost your sales and revenue
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Eggflow?
One stop solution to help drive in more sales with tracking of each lead. The best feature i like about eggflow is its seamless integration with almost all the leading CRM's.

What do you dislike about Eggflow?
Tool is relatively new and they are working on adding new features. Support is slow and better customer support is needed if the company wants to reach new heights.

What problems is Eggflow solving and how is that benefiting you?
Great at tracking leads. Helps to generate revenue by boosting traffic over our shopify store. Helps derive more business and is our one-stop solution for all marketing needs.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Eggflow?
review_question_answers.answer: One stop solution to help drive in more sales with tracking of each lead. The best feature i like about eggflow is its seamless integration with almost all the leading CRM's.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Eggflow?
review_question_answers.answer: Tool is relatively new and they are working on adding new features. Support is slow and better customer support is needed if the company wants to reach new heights.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Eggflow solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Great at tracking leads. Helps to generate revenue by boosting traffic over our shopify store. Helps derive more business and is our one-stop solution for all marketing needs.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Eggflow?
The ease of use and how the data is presented make it a great product.

What do you dislike about Eggflow?
The user interface takes some time to get a good grip on.

What problems is Eggflow solving and how is that benefiting you?
Lead generation
